so_61035374: declare -- drive='/'
declare -i minsize=$((2*10**11)) # 200 GB
if (($(df -B1 --output=avail "$drive" | tail -1)>=minsize))
then
   printf 'There is more than 200 GB left on %s\n' "$drive"
else
   printf 'There is less than 200 GB left on %s\n' "$drive"
fi
